image_compliance_rules.title: Image resolution must meet standards
image_compliance_rules.description: Images must meet minimum DPI requirements based on usage

image_compliance_rules.title: Logo must be present and unmodified
image_compliance_rules.description: Toyota logo must appear correctly without modifications

image_compliance_rules.title: Brand colors must be used correctly
image_compliance_rules.description: Images should use Toyota brand colors appropriately
image_compliance_rules.remediation: Adjust colors to match brand guidelines
